Sentencas: Surface and interface reactions of the air electrode with the contacting components of solid oxide cells are essential for the long term operation stability and performance.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of Sr-doped lanthanum manganite air electrode in different moisture atmospheres

Sentencas: In this work, an yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte (YSZ)/strontium-doped lanthanum manganite electrode (LSM)/AISI 441 alloy interconnect tri-layer structure has been fabricated in order to simulate the working environment of a real cell with Cr-containing interconnect.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of Sr-doped lanthanum manganite air electrode in different moisture atmospheres

Sentencas: The samples are thermally treated in moist air atmospheres (0 vol%, 10 vol%, and 25 vol% moisture) at 800 degrees C for up to 500 h.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of Sr-doped lanthanum manganite air electrode in different moisture atmospheres

Sentencas: The interactions among different cell components are characterized.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of Sr-doped lanthanum manganite air electrode in different moisture atmospheres

Sentencas: The LSM air electrode shows slight grain growth but the growth is less in moist atmospheres.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of Sr-doped lanthanum manganite air electrode in different moisture atmospheres

Sentencas: High moisture level affects the bonding between the LSM and the YSZ and leads to the formation of small particles on the YSZ surface.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of Sr-doped lanthanum manganite air electrode in different moisture atmospheres

Sentencas: The amount of Cr deposition on the LSM surface is slightly more for the samples thermally treated in the moist atmospheres and shows no significant difference between the 10 vol% and 25 vol% moisture air.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of Sr-doped lanthanum manganite air electrode in different moisture atmospheres

Sentencas: At the YSZ/LSM interface, La enrichment is significant and facilitates the Cr deposition while Mn depletion occurs.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of Sr-doped lanthanum manganite air electrode in different moisture atmospheres

Sentencas: The YSZ surface composition is not strongly affected by the atmosphere.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of Sr-doped lanthanum manganite air electrode in different moisture atmospheres
